long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Blokr checks and warns users of dangerous ETH addresses, contracts, and NFTs to ensure their web3 assets stay safe.  This extension will check the pages visit for scams/social engineering and enable users with a hover to scan each wallet address before interacting. 

The Blokr extension is an extension of the Blokr (blokr.org) is a community project to keep web3 users safe from scams.  Blokr aggregates on-chain transactional data and off-chain context (websites, client data, partner reports) to create a TrustGraph for each known wallet or contract address.  

This enables participating  users, wallets and defi ecosystems to provide a quick check for their users to ensure their transactions are safe prior to executing.  Platforms can consume this data directly via API (below) and use to show error warnings tied to the risk or trust indicated by the API response.
